entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
